title: Afghan FM, Pakistani envoy discuss bilateral ties
content:
Acting Minister of Foreign Affairs Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan Maulvi Amir Khan Mutaqi, met Pakistanâ€™s ambassador to Afghanistan Mansoor Ahmad Khan at his office at the Foreign Ministry in Kabul on Tuesday.
According to the ambassador, they discussed strengthening bilateral cooperation particularly facilitating humanitarian, economic and people to people exchanges.
Meanwhile, the ambassador also met UN High Commissioner for Refugees Filippo Grandi.
